org.wtc.eclipse.platform.helpers
Interface IUIHelper

public interface IUIHelper

Helper for additional UI driver macros and UI generated input that is visible to tools and helper implementations.

Method Summary
 void annoy(IUIContext ui)
          annoy - Beep the system a few times.
 void arrowDown(IUIContext ui, int numberOfTimes)
          arrowDown - Tap the down arrow the given number of times.
 void arrowUp(IUIContext ui, int numberOfTimes)
          arrowUp - Tap the up arrow the given number of times.
 void freeze(IUIContext ui)
          freeze - Stop the UI driver.
 void pressEnter(IUIContext ui)
          pressEnter - Simple helper for pressing the enter key.
 void screenshot(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String title)
          Take a screenshot with the given title and place it in the harness-specific screenshot output directory.
 void thaw()
          thaw - If the test is frozen with a freeze() call, then let the test continue execution until the next freeze() call is made.
 

Method Detail

annoy

void annoy(IUIContext ui)
annoy - Beep the system a few times. A utility method that is useful in debugging (specifically, when I'm debugging a test and want to watch something specific happen, but I don't want to watch the whole test, then I drop this method in right before the interesting part).

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input

arrowDown

void arrowDown(IUIContext ui,
               int numberOfTimes)
arrowDown - Tap the down arrow the given number of times.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
numberOfTimes - - Number of times to hit the down arrow

arrowUp

void arrowUp(IUIContext ui,
             int numberOfTimes)
arrowUp - Tap the up arrow the given number of times.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
numberOfTimes - - Number of times to hit the up arrow

freeze

void freeze(IUIContext ui)
freeze - Stop the UI driver. Do not exist the test. Leave the UI in the current state. May only be called in development (if the prodMode environment variable is set to anything other than "dev", then issue a test case failure)

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input

pressEnter

void pressEnter(IUIContext ui)
pressEnter - Simple helper for pressing the enter key.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input

screenshot

void screenshot(IUIContext ui,
                java.lang.String title)
Take a screenshot with the given title and place it in the harness-specific screenshot output directory.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI-generated input
title - - Title of the screenshot. The current total screenshot count will be appended to this title. Extension is not required. Will be output as a PNG file

thaw

void thaw()
thaw - If the test is frozen with a freeze() call, then let the test continue execution until the next freeze() call is made.
